iam.login.title: Sign in to EcoSmart
iam.login.subtitle: Use your verified credentials to coordinate urban operations and deliver better services for residents.

iam.login.errors.generic: We couldn't start the session, please try again.
iam.register.title: Activate your EcoSmart access
iam.register.subtitle: Complete the form to collaborate with your team, share alerts, and make data-backed decisions.
iam.register.errors.generic: We couldn't complete your registration, please verify your data.
iam.dashboard.title: Authenticated session
iam.dashboard.description: Use these cards to validate that the backend responds correctly with your JWT before moving to the next context.
profile.title: User profile
profile.subtitle: Review your personal data synchronized with EcoSmart and keep your emergency contacts updated.
profile.form.title: Profile information
profile.form.description: These fields are optional but help responders act faster during an incident.
profile.errors.load: We couldn't load your profile. Try again in a few moments.
profile.errors.save: We couldn't save your changes. Review the data and try again.
sidebar.hero.tagline: Operate every EcoSmart context from a single control surface
layout.footer.slogan: Coordinating data-driven sanitation for cleaner, safer cities.
